    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:uciteljska/111934</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/111934</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Živalske sledi v snegu</string>
            <string language="en">Animal footprints in snow</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tierabdrücke im Schnee</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Empreintes de pas animales dans la neige</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pegadas animais na neve</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Orme animali in neve</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ζωικά ίχνη στο χιόνι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Huellas animales en nieve</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Učni listi so namenjeni raziskovanju - iskanju živalskih sledi v snegu in merjenju višine snežne odeje. Tabelo živalskih sledi (prva stran) lahko povečamo na format A3 in jo plastificiramo. Če določenih sledi ne prepoznamo, jih fotografiramo in za pomoč prosimo učitelja biologije. Za merjenje debeline snežne odeje napotke najdete v gradivu Državne založbe Slovenije (del. zvezek).</string>
            <string language="en">Images of footprints of different animals, how to distinct between them, how to observe and measure them,</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">živalske sledi</string>
            <string language="en">animal footprints</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">sneg</string>
            <string language="en">snow</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">opazovanje</string>
            <string language="en">observation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">merjenje</string>
            <string language="en">measuring</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bilder von Abdrücken der unterschiedlichen 
Tiere, wie zu eindeutigem zwischen ihnen, wie man sie beobachtet und 
mißt,</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Images des empreintes de pas de différents 
animaux, comment à distinct entre elles, comment les observer et 
mesurer,</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Imagens das pegadas de animais diferentes, como a
distinto entre ele, como observá-lo e medir,</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Immagini delle orme degli animali differenti, 
come a distinto fra loro, come osservarle e misurare,</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εικόνες των ιχνών των διαφορετικών ζώων, πώς σε 
ευδιάκριτο μεταξύ τους, πώς να τους παρατηρήσει και να μετρήσει,</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Imágenes de huellas de diversos animales, cómo 
a distinto entre él, cómo observarlos y medir,</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tierabdrücke</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schnee</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beobachtung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Messen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">empreintes de pas animales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">neige</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">observation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mesure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pegadas animais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">neve</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">observação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">medição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">orme animali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">neve</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">osservazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">misurazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ζωικά ίχνη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χιόνι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">huellas animales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">nieve</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">observación</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el medir</string>
          </keyword>
